last_episode_to_air.name: After the Strom
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hui-ju finds herself in her darkest hour yet. When Hae-won reveals she was there the night of the incident, Hui-ju runs out of options.

name: Reflection of You
overview: A thriving painter's enviable life begins to fray at the edges when a bright young woman she once befriended resurfaces as a shell of her former self.

episodes.name: Someone Like You
episodes.overview: When her daughter is assaulted at school, a furious Jeong Hui-ju confronts the teacher who is responsible. She's reminded of someone she used to know.

episodes.name: Your Name Is
episodes.overview: An Li-sa wakes up her family in the middle of the night in a panic. Hui-ju can't shake the suspicion that Gu Hae-won's reappearance isn't mere coincidence.

episodes.name: My Personal Story
episodes.overview: Years ago, a fast friendship formed as Hae-won gave Hui-ju drawing lessons. When an emergency came up one day, Hae-won sent in a substitute teacher.

episodes.name: What Shouldn't Be Loved
episodes.overview: The possibility of Seo Woo-jae's return places Hui-ju further on edge. Lee Ju-yeong hands Hui-ju her old cellphone.

episodes.name: Nobody Lied
episodes.overview: Reunited with Woo-jae at the opening of his art exhibit, Hui-ju learns why he disappeared for so long. Hae-won consults a doctor about his condition.

episodes.name: That's Not How Love Ends
episodes.overview: Increasing encounters with Woo-jae, as well as unsettling run-ins with Hae-won — who seems to know a damaging secret — shake up Hui-ju.

episodes.name: If Love Is The Beginning Of Misfortune
episodes.overview: The art gallery makes a new hire and asks Hui-ju for a favor on an upcoming project. Hae-won's mind is set on having the wedding she always wanted.

episodes.name: Us, Here Again
episodes.overview: An old sketchbook Hui-ju thought she destroyed turns up again. Hae-won stands up for Ju-yeong's family against An Hyeon-seong.

episodes.name: Wavering Without The Wind
episodes.overview: A forbidden tryst at the wedding has an unwitting witness. Hui-ju finds out something that Hyeon-seong has been keeping from her.

episodes.name: Point Of No Return
episodes.overview: Hae-won experiences a sudden loss. Woo-jae tries to make sense of his fragmented memories. Hui-ju prepares for her son's birthday party.

episodes.name: Anyone, Anytime, Can Be a Monster
episodes.overview: An Ho-su's kidnapping stirs up panic in Hui-ju and Hyeon-seong, who each have their own suspects. Hae-won leaves a mysterious envelope for Hui-ju.

episodes.name: Not Hell Yet
episodes.overview: Hyeon-seong shows Hui-ju that he will allow nothing to come between their marriage. In search of all he's lost, Woo-jae sets off back to Ireland.

episodes.name: Some Times Do Not Disappear
episodes.overview: Hui-ju feels cornered when her mother-in-law acquires Ho-su's birth certificate. Woo-jae returns from his trip with a question for Hyeon-seong.

episodes.name: Did Not Love Anyone
episodes.overview: While Hae-won refuses to divorce, Woo-jae's actions toward Hui-ju grow brasher. Meanwhile, An Min-seo grapples with her abusive marriage.

episodes.name: Breakups Are Harder Than Being In Love
episodes.overview: Hui-ju exits her art collaboration with Woo-jae and responds to an alarming call from Li-sa's teacher. Hae-won is found in a worrying state.

episodes.name: After the Strom
episodes.overview: Hui-ju finds herself in her darkest hour yet. When Hae-won reveals she was there the night of the incident, Hui-ju runs out of options.
